alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 4:17PM CST until December 15 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Southeastern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 445 PM CST. * At 417 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Sloan, or 18 miles southeast of Sioux City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lawton around 430 PM CST. Moville around 435 PM CST. Kingsley and Pierson around 445 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bronson. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
